name: Quick and Easy Chicken and Stuffing Casserole
author: richtina
summary: This is so good, it should be illegal. Everyone in my family loves it. Even my picky 3 year old!
ingredients: 2 (10.5 ounce) cans cream of chicken soup
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook egg noodles in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 5 minutes
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix cream of chicken soup and sour cream together in a bowl; stir in chicken and noodles
Spoon mixture into the prepared baking dish; sprinkle with stuffing mix
Combine chicken broth and butter in a saucepan over medium heat until butter is melted; pour over stuffing layer
Bake in the preheated oven until casserole is bubbling and stuffing is browned, about 30 minutes
